raw_body: RATWATTE – AJIT,​ “Safe in the Arms of Jesus”. Dearly beloved husband of Nelun,​ loving father of Ishanth and Chayani,​ father-in-law of Chethika and Afsar,​ everloving grandfather of Soraya,​ passedaway peacefully on 10th July 2023. Cortege leaves residence at No. 16/​1,​ Park Road,​ Colombo 5 on Wednesday 12th July at 4.30 p.m. for Cremation at 5.30 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella. (New Crematorium).042670
